English: Engineers having this expertise can check devices for hidden faults that may be revealed in the future.
Radiomen are specialists in telecommunication devices usage. They may also obtain medical training.
Leaders take care of crew matters and they control devices meant for visual observation.
Engineers are specialists in the usage and conservation of devices on board.
The engineer can produce spare parts from scrap in the workshop in the Stern Torpedo Room.

The engineer is familiar with the use of explosives and can use them to effectively sink enemy units, saving torpedoes and ammunition.
<line-height=50%>
<line-height=100%>When this officer is assigned to the command station, he is also providing an advice for the sailors taking care of the torpedo launch procedure and the officers creating torpedo solutions to use the torpedoes more effectively against the target. This increases the effective damage done by 6%. The officer has to be present during both the torpedo flooding and the launch for this to happen.
The officer shoots more accurately from the cannon and guns. In manual mode, the recoil stabilization increases.
The officer traces enemy ships by UZO and periscopes by 25% faster. Periscope is additionally stabilized in manual mode.

Unlocks the ability to quickly knock out a sailor who has panicked instead of calming him down.
<line-height=50%>
<line-height=100%>Also, when this officer is assigned to the command station, he is keeping a close eye over the crew to ensure that everyone is quiet. Noise made by the crew as well as by torpedo loading is decreased by 30% and further 15% for each assigned sailor to him.
Officer may recruit an additional sailor to aid him.
The officer may provide medical help without the use of a first aid kit. With the first aid kit, this is done twice as fast as normal.

The officer has spent tens of hours on the hydrophone and learned to better recognize the quiet sounds from the background. The officer can detect enemy ships from 25% greater distance. In addition, in manual mode, the sea noise is slightly quieter.
The sailors assigned to the officer are able to provide medical assistance, but they do it noticeably slower than the officers.
The officer can analyze captured allied equipment in the workshop to gain an acceleration of random technology research of 40% or unlock new minor research in headquarters.
The officer can be assigned to work in the galley. He provides a discipline bonus for the crew by working there.
The officer meets all class requirements for the missions in the headquarters.
Assignments performed by the officer in the headquarters are done 35% faster.

The officer has long practice of using the radio and can both receive and send messages 33% faster, considerably decreasing the chance that enemy will notice and triangulate the transmission in the latter case.

This engineer perfectly knows how to handle the diesel engines on u-boats. There will be no visible smoke coming from the engines when this officer works at the station, lowering enemy chances of spotting your boat. If your boat is using a snorkel, smoke is still there, but is less visible than normal.

This engineer recovers some scrap from completed major repairs.
<line-height=50%>
<line-height=100%>Also, when this officer is assigned to the command station, he is overseeing more complex maintenance tasks over the devices on the ship. This further decreases the inflicted damage on them by 5% for each sailor assigned to the officer, on top of the base class bonus.

When this officer personally visits warehouse in a port or is a part of delegation on a supply ship, he gets 25% lower prices for goods (this effect is not cumulative from multiple officers). Using this knowledge he can also evaluate, if the goods stated in the shipping documents of a neutral freighter match the imports of their claimed destination port to find out, if they are smugglers or not.

Playing cards with crew increases morale by 25%. The presence of this officer during various events, increases success chance of persuasion checks.
<line-height=50%>
<line-height=100%>Also, when this officer is assigned to the command station, the stress growth on the ship is slowed by 10% and further 10% for each sailor assigned to the officer.
When stress on board rises to 100% during an alarm situation for the first time, the presence of this officer adds courage to the rest of the crew and there are no negative effects from it.
This officer is tougher than most and can stand more damage. He receives an additional health point.
This officer is always in hurry. He both walks and runs 10% faster than normal.

This officer likes living and always finds a way to survive  hardship. When he is rendered unconscious on the deck or conning tower, he usually manages to get inside the boat, instead of falling overboard. The bleedout time for this officer is also increased by 50%.
The officer shoots more accurately from the cannon and guns. In manual mode, recoil stabilization increases.
This officer can communicate fluently in English. It may be useful during offship missions.
This officer can communicate fluently in Spanish. It may be useful during offship missions.
This officer can communicate fluently in Portuguese. It may be useful during offship missions.
This officer can communicate fluently in French. It may be useful during offship missions.
This officer was trained in the use of diving suits and performs all tasks 50% faster while diving to sunk wrecks. He can also survive for longer, if he looses a steady supply of air while diving.
This officer may communicate fluently in most languages. It may be useful during off-boat missions.
The officer can crudely estimate velocity and type of targets using the hydrophone. In addition, in manual mode, an exact angle is displayed for the selected direction.
This engineer is able to carry out inspections of equipment on board to prevent random malfunctions from occurring during combat situations.
The officer carefully carries out maintenance of torpedoes, completely eliminating the risk of a detonator failure and extending the time for which they remain maintained by 25%.

This officer is able to perform navigation tasks exceptionally well. For this reason, he may rise navigation quality level to 150% instead of 100%. Using this knowledge he can also put in question the course of boarded freighters considering their claimed target port in the shipping documents.
